trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Clarksburg
There were no other sightings in Clarksburg on or around October 26th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was too far away to see any details of the object. When I first saw the object I thought "Oh there is a blimp" but I have never seen a blimp anywhere in the sky before. I called the airport and they had no information about any blimps in or around the area. Weird.
